value.title: Time to look at the new INDEX function in DAX and Power BI
value.excerpt: The latest DAX functions in Power BI can be very "power"ful! Patrick starts by looking at the INDEX function to solve a customer problem!  Blog announcement: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/blog/power-bi-december-2022-feature-summary/#post-21693-_Toc121395731  INDEX function (DAX) https://learn.microsoft.com/dax/index-function-dax

value.title: Use Microsoft Flow, and other options, to refresh your Power BI dataset

value.title: Visualize Graph Data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you wondered how to visualize graph data? No, not Microsoft Graph. Graph Networks! Adam shows you how you can do this in Power BI Desktop.  Download sample: http://guyinacu.be/graphdatasample  Microsoft Graph API: https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/overview  Graphs and Networks https://www.mathworks.com/help/matlab/graph-and-network-algorithms.html

value.title: What is a Common Table Expression (CTE) and how do you use them?
value.excerpt: We've had some questions about what a Common Table Expression (CTE) is. Patrick describes what they are and how you can use them in SQL Server or Azure Synapse Analytics. value.title: Document a Power BI file and report in a few clicks   all DAX code visualization Power Query scripts
value.excerpt: In this article and video, I’ll share with you how to document everything from a Power BI file in a few clicks. The document output will have all the DAX code (measures, columns, and tables) with the expressions, the tables with the Power Query scripts, information about visualization such as how many

value.title: Get Data from Multiple Excel Files with Different Sheet Names into Power BI
value.excerpt: The ability to use Get Data from Folder in Power BI is a very useful option. However, if your sheet names are different in the list of Excel files, then you will face a problem. In this video, I’ll explain a method you can use that works regardless of the sheet names. Download the sample files from my

value.title: Multi select slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: This is a very short, simple video about how to have a multi-select slicer in Power BI. Power BI slicer is in fact multi-select by default, however, there is a very small option that if you set it, makes it even easier to use, let’s talk about it. read my article about this here: https://radacad.com/multi-select-slicer-in-power-bi

value.title: Power BI Architecture Best Practice
value.excerpt: Using Power BI is simple. However, using it properly needs a good architecture. In a multi-developer environment, the architecture of a Power BI implementation should allow multiple developers to work on the same solution at the same time. On the other hand, the Power BI architecture should be designed

value.excerpt: Power BI reports are highly interactive, If you select a column in a column chart other charts will be highlighted. value.title: Automate data cleaning with Power Query
value.excerpt: This module introduces Power Query in Microsoft Excel, a powerful data connection, cleaning, and shaping technology that is a core part of the Microsoft modern analytics suite of business intelligence tools.
